Helen Collver

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Colver
  2. Foster Name: Unknown
  3. Foster Family: Albert McLellan
  4. Foster Family Alt: McClellen
  5. Location of Family: Grand Island, NE
  6. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  7. Arrival Place: Aurora, NE
  8. Age on Arrival: 14
  9. Date of Birth: 2/15/1903, Naples, NY
  10. Gender: female
  11. Married Name: Burtch; Lindholm; Dougherty
  12. Spouse Name: Samuel Burtch; Ernest Lindholm; Verne Dougherty
  13. Notes: In 1920 she is living with the Joseph Ross family in Wood River, NE.
  14. Source: ORT, 566; Eloise Thomsen Corres.; Hamilton County Register, 15 June 1917, 22 June 1917; 1920 United States Federal Census.
